short_summary: Request for Proposal for a dust suppressant
description: The ACOA, on behalf of Project Delivery Program, is issuing this request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a dust suppressant including delivery at Wemindji, Eastmain and Waskaganish (Quebec).
full_summary:
**Tender Notice # T3033-230038**
==========================

**Request for Proposal (RFP) for Dust Suppressor Acquisition**

**Publication Date**: February 12, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**: March 18, 2024, at 14:00:00

**Subject of Tender**: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Transport Canada, invites proposals for the acquisition of a dust suppressant inclusive of delivery to Wemindji, Eastmain, and Waskaganish, Quebec.

**Key Information**
------------------

* Tender Reference Number: WS4387524335-Doc4398556765
* Solicitation Number: WS4387524335
* Amendment Number: 2
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 29, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: Not specified
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)

**Background and Requirements**
-----------------------------

The dust suppressant is required to meet specific requirements outlined in the Annexed “Statement of Requirements”. The successful bidder is expected to provide the equipment and delivery services to the specified locations.

**Evaluation Criteria**
----------------------

Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price criterion.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This tender is open to bidders participating in the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For further information, please contact:
Francois S. Martineau
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18773023](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18773023)

**Notice URL**
----------------

Please visit the above-noted website for tender documentation and submission
